abstract: An article on the Square Feet pages on Wednesday about the new North American headquarters of HSBC in Mettawa, Ill., referred incorrectly to the building’s features. It does not have an auditorium. The article also misstated the number of bank branches that HSBC has worldwide. It is 10,000, not 1,000.

lead_paragraph: An article on the Square Feet pages on Wednesday about the new North American headquarters of HSBC in Mettawa, Ill., referred incorrectly to the building’s features. It does not have an auditorium. The article also misstated the number of bank branches that HSBC has worldwide. It is 10,000, not 1,000.
